name: Astralyx
description:
Absolutely the best video game in existence, could never be considered a prototype that was made in 2 days and isn't actually fun.
- Nobody ever Astralyx (Prototype)

Astralyx right now is a prototype for a space colonisation game, where you build and shape an entire planet to your own liking.

Normally my games are PlayStation 1 styled but I wanted to do a more cutesy cartoony style!

Controls:

WASD - Move

N - Create new object

Enter - Place object

Q and E - Change object

C - Change the colours of nature (Debug)

All music is by TAD on open game art.

All sounds from open game art.
